review: This is my second Apple TV unit. The first was an Apple TV second generation and which gave years of service. This new third generation thus far has built on the solid foundations of the first. All my equipment is Apple related and uses iTunes. This allows me to watch a movie from my iPad, iPhone, and of course on my TV. This does it all from Netflix to Youtube and actually seems quite able to be tailored to your specific requirements.I also like that they lowered the price because with so much competition now, I was considered different systems. The price drop really made this more competitive in my opinion.
